title: Health Care Rules Proposed to Shield Transgender Patients From Bias
text:
04 Health Care Rules Proposed to Shield Transgender Patients From Bias 
The New York Times: WASHINGTON â€” The Obama administration proposed a rule Thursday that would forbid most health insurers and medical providers to discriminate against transgender patients, including by prohibiting insurers from categorically denying coverage of care related to gender transition.
